entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening then periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with rain. High 7.
